apple_vendor_description: Apple's depiction of the couple with a heart, showcasing a man with a light skin tone and a woman with a medium-dark skin tone, is a beautiful representation of romantic union. The figures are drawn with Apple’s characteristic smooth lines and soft shading, looking warm and approachable. The prominent, glowing heart between them, rendered with Apple’s signature glossy finish and realistic lighting, powerfully conveys love, partnership, and affection between a man and a woman on Apple devices.
